metadata.name: Modern Breadcrumb with Theme Toggle
metadata.description: A modern breadcrumb navigation component with a theme toggle feature. The breadcrumb links are interactive, and the theme toggle allows switching between light and dark modes. The design includes smooth transitions, a gradient overlay, and ripple effects on link clicks.
